author: fedor
msg: removing dependency on xerces. There is no need for it and it makes it possible to upgrade to xerces-2. Before it was not possible due to ant's classloader issues

author: brekke
msg: Created some simple tests to exercise the getDate() in BaseValueParser
with regards to the TimeSelector fields.  Since BaseValueParser requires
TurbineResources, the test requires Turbine running so this test runs in
Currently these tests do not use any properties so instead of creating
another tr.props for this test, it just reuses the tr.props from the cache
test.  I left a comment in the setUp() method about this.
